full_text: A fun stash knit. Free Knitting Pattern for Flat Freddie. A stash knit, knitted flat (no dpns) and then seamed up the back. Features are added and then the arms and ears are sewn on last after stuffing and seaming. Personalise Freddie depending what materials you have available, toy eyes and nose can be used or embroider using yarn you already have. Its a fun little knit and each one comes up looking different depending on yarn used, so they all have a different look and personality ! Pattern is available here https://cooldenim.co.uk/index.php/2024/12/10/flat-freddie... Uses small amount of dk yarn (main colour and small amount for a contrast). 3.5mm needles. Finished size is approx. 15cm (5.5inches) high. The pattern includes full written instructions and image tutorial. Enjoy!
name: Ravelry: Flat Freddie Knitted Toy pattern by creative neats
